objects.text:
• Premium Flyknit construction
• Gold swoosh & signature style
• Air-cushioned midsole comfort
• Street style meets performance

product_details.name: Nike Air Jordan 1 Flyknit - Wolf Grey/Golden Swoosh Edition
product_details.description:
• Premium Flyknit upper construction for lightweight breathability
• Iconic high-top silhouette with modern technology
• Striking grey colorway with metallic gold Nike swoosh
• Classic gum rubber outsole for superior traction
• Engineered mesh pattern for enhanced durability
• Air-cushioned midsole for all-day comfort
• Signature Jordan brand wing logo detailing
• Versatile design perfect for both street style and casual wear
• Responsive cushioning system for optimal support
• Traditional lacing system for secure fit

banner_details:
The banner features a dynamic and sporty layout designed to promote a limited edition sneaker. The background is a diagonally split dual-tone gradient, with a darker charcoal grey on the left and a golden yellow hue on the right, intersected by subtle white diagonal lines for added depth. At the top left, the "heading" text element in bold white typography conveys brand identity. Just below it, the "subheading" and "tagline" are styled in metallic gold to emphasize exclusivity. A horizontal "decorative_divider" bar separates the branding from a bulleted "description" about the product's key features. Anchoring the bottom-left, the "price" in large, bright white font attracts attention, with a gold "cta_button_bg" and black "cta" text for a call to action. A prominent "product_image" of the sneaker sits to the right, partially overlapping the golden section to create visual flow and highlight the product.

**Color Palette:**
- Charcoal Grey: #2B2B2B to #1A1A1A (gradient)
- Gold: #D4AF37
- Light Gold: #F2D05E
- White: #FFFFFF
- Black: #000000
product_color: The product image features a pair of high-top sneakers with a soft and modern color palette. Dominantly, a cool light gray (#D3D7DA) forms the body knit, providing a clean and breathable appearance. Contrasting this is a warm mustard yellow (#D89D29) found on the swoosh, logo, and sole accents, which effectively highlights the branding and adds energy. The white midsole (#F2F2F2) balances both primary shades, helping them blend while keeping the design sleek. This palette is visually harmonious yet dynamic, making it perfect for a sporty and youthful advertisement banner. Supporting colors like soft charcoal (#7A7F85) from the laces offer depth.
